Description: The Alabanza Control Panel does not require passwords to access administrative commands, which allows remote attackers to modify domain name information via the nsManager.cgi CGI program.
clean_description: alabanza control panel require passwords access administrative commands allows remote attackers modify domain name information nsmanager.cgi cgi program

Description: An issue was discovered on August Connect devices. Insecure data transfer between the August app and August Connect during configuration allows attackers to discover home Wi-Fi credentials. This data transfer uses an unencrypted access point for these credentials, and passes them in an HTTP POST, using the AugustWifiDevice class, with data encrypted with a fixed key found obfuscated in the app.
clean_description: issue discovered august connect devices. insecure data transfer august app august connect configuration allows attackers discover home wi-fi credentials. data transfer uses unencrypted access point credentials passes http post using augustwifidevice class data encrypted fixed key found obfuscated app

Description: Use of hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability in August Connect Wi-Fi Bridge App, Connect Firmware allows an attacker to decrypt an intercepted payload containing the Wi-Fi network authentication credentials. This issue affects: August Connect Wi-Fi Bridge App version v10.11.0 and prior versions on Android. August Connect Firmware version 2.2.12 and prior versions.
clean_description: use hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability august connect wi-fi bridge app connect firmware allows attacker decrypt intercepted payload containing wi-fi network authentication credentials. issue affects: august connect wi-fi bridge app version v10.11.0 prior versions android. august connect firmware version 2.2.12 prior versions
